data.name: Zombie Panic! Source Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Zombie Panic! Source Official Soundtrack by KillahMo and KaempeLaeske introduces you 29 different types of atmospheres and vibes while playing Zombie Panic! Source: a cooperative, survival-horror, first-person shooter. A total standalone modification, available for free on Steam.

The original soundtrack was first created by KillahMo and released on Dec 28, 2007. Then our latest sound designer, KaempeLaeske, created three new soundtracks to our newest maps shipped on ZPS v3.0 (Frozenheart, Work Hazard, and Zomboeing); which was released on Dec 8, 2017.

The Zombie Panic! Source OST will be downloaded to your computer as MP3 files and located at: \steamapps\common\Zombie Panic Source\soundtrack.
You are required to have Zombie Panic! Source installed on your PC to receive this DLC content.

TrackList

1. Chapel Of Unrest - 03:34
2. City Of Souls - 03:32
3. Cloud Of Sorrow - 04:07
4. Deep Caverns - 03:37
5. Descent - 04:18
6. Desert Of Darkness - 04:19
7. Foggy Meadow - 04:18
8. Forgotten Kingdom - 02:56
9. Frozen Wasteland - 04:54
10. Halls - 04:00
11. Hell - 05:29
12. Hollow - 04:54
13. Horde - 04:56
14. House Of Whispers - 04:24
15. Nigtmare - 04:53
16. Orphanage - 03:27
17. Pitch Black - 04:07
18. Plague - 03:10
19. Rebirth - 04:04
20. Sewers - 03:18
21. Subway - 04:00
22. Torture Chamber - 03:02
23. Zombie Panic Theme Song - 03:12
24. Abandoned Mine - 03:24
25. Frozen Heart - 03:56
26. Work Hazard - 04:47
27. Zomboeing - 04:18
28. Silent Horror - 3:09
29. Glowing Mist - 2:15
